TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HDInsightOnDemandLinkedService extends Azure.ResourceManager.DataFactory.Models.DataFactoryLinkedServiceProperties

Docs.summary: HDInsight ondemand linked service.

MemberSignature.Value: public HDInsightOnDemandLinkedService (Azure.Core.Expressions.DataFactory.DataFactoryElement<string> clusterSize, Azure.Core.Expressions.DataFactory.DataFactoryElement<string> timeToLiveExpression, Azure.Core.Expressions.DataFactory.DataFactoryElement<string> version, Azure.Core.Expressions.DataFactory.DataFactoryLinkedServiceReference linkedServiceName, Azure.Core.Expressions.DataFactory.DataFactoryElement<string> hostSubscriptionId, Azure.Core.Expressions.DataFactory.DataFactoryElement<string> tenant, Azure.Core.Expressions.DataFactory.DataFactoryElement<string> clusterResourceGroup);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Azure.Core.Expressions.DataFactory.DataFactoryElement`1<string> clusterSize, class Azure.Core.Expressions.DataFactory.DataFactoryElement`1<string> timeToLiveExpression, class Azure.Core.Expressions.DataFactory.DataFactoryElement`1<string> version, class Azure.Core.Expressions.DataFactory.DataFactoryLinkedServiceReference linkedServiceName, class Azure.Core.Expressions.DataFactory.DataFactoryElement`1<string> hostSubscriptionId, class Azure.Core.Expressions.DataFactory.DataFactoryElement`1<string> tenant, class Azure.Core.Expressions.DataFactory.DataFactoryElement`1<string> clusterResourceGroup) cil managed

Public Sub New (clusterSize As DataFactoryElement(Of String), timeToLiveExpression As DataFactoryElement(Of String), version As DataFactoryElement(Of String), linkedServiceName As DataFactoryLinkedServiceReference, hostSubscriptionId As DataFactoryElement(Of String), tenant As DataFactoryElement(Of String), clusterResourceGroup As DataFactoryElement(Of String))

MemberSignature.Usage: new Azure.ResourceManager.DataFactory.Models.HDInsightOnDemandLinkedService (clusterSize, timeToLiveExpression, version, linkedServiceName, hostSubscriptionId, tenant, clusterResourceGroup)

Docs.param: Number of worker/data nodes in the cluster. Suggestion value: 4. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

The allowed idle time for the on-demand HDInsight cluster. Specifies how long the on-demand HDInsight cluster stays alive after completion of an activity run if there are no other active jobs in the cluster. The minimum value is 5 mins. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
Version of the HDInsight cluster. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
Azure Storage linked service to be used by the on-demand cluster for storing and processing data.
The customer’s subscription to host the cluster. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
The Tenant id/name to which the service principal belongs. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
The resource group where the cluster belongs. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of HDInsightOnDemandLinkedService.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AdditionalLinkedServiceNames As IList(Of DataFactoryLinkedServiceReference)

Docs.summary: Specifies additional storage accounts for the HDInsight linked service so that the Data Factory service can register them on your behalf.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ClusterNamePrefix As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The prefix of cluster name, postfix will be distinct with timestamp. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
The password to access the cluster.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ClusterResourceGroup As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The resource group where the cluster belongs. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ClusterSize As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: Number of worker/data nodes in the cluster. Suggestion value: 4. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
The password to SSH remotely connect cluster’s node (for Linux).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ClusterSshUserName As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The username to SSH remotely connect to cluster’s node (for Linux). Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ClusterType As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The cluster type. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ClusterUserName As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The username to access the cluster. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: member this.CoreConfiguration : BinaryData with get, set

Docs.summary:
Specifies the core configuration parameters (as in core-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster to be created.
To assign an object to this property use .
To assign an already formatted json string to this property use .
Examples:
BinaryData.FromObjectAsJson("foo")Creates a payload of "foo".
BinaryData.FromString("\"foo\"")Creates a payload of "foo".
BinaryData.FromObjectAsJson(new { key = "value" })Creates a payload of { "key": "value" }.
BinaryData.FromString("{\"key\": \"value\"}")Creates a payload of { "key": "value" }.
The credential reference containing authentication information.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.DataNodeSize : BinaryData with get, set

Docs.summary:
Specifies the size of the data node for the HDInsight cluster.
To assign an object to this property use .
To assign an already formatted json string to this property use .
Examples:
BinaryData.FromObjectAsJson("foo")Creates a payload of "foo".
BinaryData.FromString("\"foo\"")Creates a payload of "foo".
BinaryData.FromObjectAsJson(new { key = "value" })Creates a payload of { "key": "value" }.
BinaryData.FromString("{\"key\": \"value\"}")Creates a payload of { "key": "value" }.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.EncryptedCredential : string with get, set

Docs.summary: The encrypted credential used for authentication. Credentials are encrypted using the integration runtime credential manager. Type: string.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.HBaseConfiguration : BinaryData with get, set

Docs.summary:
Specifies the HBase configuration parameters (hbase-site.xml) for the HDInsight cluster.
To assign an object to this property use .
To assign an already formatted json string to this property use .
Examples:
BinaryData.FromObjectAsJson("foo")Creates a payload of "foo".
BinaryData.FromString("\"foo\"")Creates a payload of "foo".
BinaryData.FromObjectAsJson(new { key = "value" })Creates a payload of { "key": "value" }.
BinaryData.FromString("{\"key\": \"value\"}")Creates a payload of { "key": "value" }.
The name of Azure SQL linked service that point to the HCatalog database. The on-demand HDInsight cluster is created by using the Azure SQL database as the metastore.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property SubnetName As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The ARM resource ID for the subnet in the vNet. If virtualNetworkId was specified, then this property is required. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Tenant As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The Tenant id/name to which the service principal belongs. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property TimeToLiveExpression As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The allowed idle time for the on-demand HDInsight cluster. Specifies how long the on-demand HDInsight cluster stays alive after completion of an activity run if there are no other active jobs in the cluster. The minimum value is 5 mins. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Version As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: Version of the HDInsight cluster. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property VirtualNetworkId As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The ARM resource ID for the vNet to which the cluster should be joined after creation. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
